name: Dream Doll Dimension
description:
This game was created for Dream Diary Jam 5, a Yume Nikki game jam.

After a click to exit the title screen, the game uses keyboard only. Progress is saved to the browser's local storage when possible, but the game is playable in one sitting with local storage disabled.

This game contains mildly suggestive photographic content and uses abrupt scene transitions which some players might consider jump scares. It contains no nudity and no explicit violence.

You should be able to complete the game with trial and error using only in-game instructions. If you get frustrated, the downloadable zip of the game includes spoiler text files.

Art by Suzie Doll (https://flickr.com/people/suzie_doll)
